mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kpimanual( mediareadnum, livewxkswys, livewxwys, livekwjk, applitelive, udate, videopv,zfbmoney,zfbreuser,zfblive,newkwjk,fugouwx ) VALUES( #{mediareadnum}, #{livewxkswys}, #{livewxwys}, #{livekwjk}, #{applitelive}, #{udate}, #{videopv}, #{zfbmoney}, #{zfbreuser}, #{zfblive}, #{newkwjk}, #{fugouwx})
mapper.update: UPDATE kpimanual SET mediareadnum = #{mediareadnum} , livewxkswys = #{livewxkswys} , livewxwys = #{livewxwys} , livekwjk = #{livekwjk} , applitelive = #{applitelive} , udate = #{udate}, videopv = #{videopv}, zfbmoney = #{zfbmoney}, zfbreuser = #{zfbreuser}, zfblive = #{zfblive}, newkwjk = #{newkwjk}, fugouwx = #{fugouwx} where udate=#{udate}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kpimanual WHERE udate >= #{startTime} AND udate <= #{endTime} ORDER BY udate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kpimanual WHERE udate=#{udate}
